item.title: The Joy of Service
item.description:
The Joy of Service by Elder F. Arthur Kay, Of the First Quorum of the Seventy given in Saturday Afternoon of 155th Annual General Conference on Sun Mar 31 1985
This meta-podcast is not published, maintained, or endorsed by The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints, but instead by a faithful member of the Church who is seeking ways to make consuming Gospel content easier for everyone. If there are any mistakes, please report them on GitHub and we'll try to get them fixed.
item.itunes:author: Elder F. Arthur Kay, Of the First Quorum of the Seventy

item.title: Keep the Faith
item.description:
Keep the Faith by Elder F. Arthur Kay, Released member of the Second Quorum of the Seventy given in Sunday Afternoon of 159th Semiannual General Conference on Sat Sep 30 1989
This meta-podcast is not published, maintained, or endorsed by The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints, but instead by a faithful member of the Church who is seeking ways to make consuming Gospel content easier for everyone. If there are any mistakes, please report them on GitHub and we'll try to get them fixed.
